comment._content: Daighter of President Woodrow Wilson.  Married Secretary of the Treasury William Gibbs McAdoo at the White House on May 7, 1914.

comment._content: insane bt werez the raw pic

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The Blushing Bridegroom was 26 years older than Eleanor:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2636491708/]

"Nellie" and McAdoo were divorced after twenty years of marriage (two children), in 1934.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you all for the additional information on Eleanor Randolph Wilson.  We will include some of it in the image description when we update.
